    • newAlert

      public PluginPassiveScanner.AlertBuilder newAlert()
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Description copied from class: PluginPassiveScanner
      Returns a new alert builder.

      By default the alert builder sets the following fields of the alert:

      • Plugin ID - using PluginPassiveScanner.getPluginId()
      • Name - using PassiveScanner.getName()
      • Message - the message being scanned
      • URI - from the alert message
      • Alert Tags - using PluginPassiveScanner.getAlertTags()
      Overrides:
      newAlert in class PluginPassiveScanner
      Returns:
      the alert builder.
      Since:
      2.9.0
